_meanings:
{@--1@} Not knowing, unaware of, 
unconscious, devoid of knowledge or
experience; {#ajYo Bavati vE bAlaH#}  
<ls>Ms. 2. 153</ls>; {#jYAjYO#} ({#jYaH ISvaraH ajYaH jIvaH#}) the
knowing and unknowing, supreme
and individual soul.

{@--2@} Ignorant,
unwise, foolish, silly, stupid (said
of men as well as animals); {#ajYaH#}
{#suKamArADyaH#} <ls>Bh. 2. 3</ls>, <ls>Pt. 2. 3.</ls>

{@--3@} Inanimate; not endowed with
the power of understanding ({#acetana#}.)
